title: Noam Chomsky: Trump is a 'Devastating Prospect'â€”Cast Your Vote for the Democrat
description:
In this Majority Report clip, Noam Chomsky appears on "Democracy Now" and makes a case against abstaining from voting in the presidential election. Chomsky is a Sanders supporter, but at this point, it's more important to make sure that Donald Trump doesn't get anywhere near the Oval Office.
